name: Moa Kikuchi
description: {{nihongo|'''Moa Kikuchi'''|菊地 最愛|Kikuchi Moa|born July 4, 1999}}, known by her [[stage name]] '''Moametal''', is a Japanese singer and dancer. She is best known as a member of the [[kawaii metal]] band [[Babymetal]], and was formerly a member of the [[Japanese idol|idol]] group [[Sakura Gakuin]]. She is represented by the talent agency [[Amuse Inc.]]
